amendment.description: To amend title 10, United States Code, to reduce the age for receipt of military retired pay for nonregular service from 60 to 55.

action.text: Amendment SA 3303 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3303 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 49. Record Vote Number: 136.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3303 made in Senate.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3303.

Amendment SA 3303 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Corzine. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To amend title 10, United States Code, to reduce the age for receipt of military retired pay for nonregular service from 60 to 55.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3303 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 49. Record Vote Number: 136.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3303 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Corzine.
